title: User Account Creation
description: As a customer, I want to create a user account, so that I can access personalized features and services.
attributes_and_rules: Users must be able to sign up using email, mobile number, or social login options.
Passwords should be encrypted for security.
Email and mobile verification is required.
acceptance_criteria: Given a registration form, when a user submits valid details, then an account should be created and verification emails/texts should be sent.
Given incomplete or invalid registration details, when a user submits them, then appropriate error messages should be displayed.

steps: Given the registration page, when a user submits valid details, then an account is created and verification messages are sent.
Given the registration page, when a user submits invalid details, then error messages are displayed.

title: Product Catalog Browsing
description: As a customer, I want to browse through a product catalog, so that I can find items I am interested in purchasing.
attributes_and_rules: Products must be categorized and taggable.
Search functionality should support filters like price, brand, ratings, and availability.
acceptance_criteria: Given the catalog, when a user browses, then they should see products categorized and tagged correctly.
Given the search filter, when a user applies it, then products should be filtered accordingly.

steps: Given the product catalog, when a user browses, then products should display correct categories and tags.
Given the search filter, when a user applies it, then only products matching criteria should be displayed.

title: Product Detail Page
description: As a customer, I want to view detailed information about a product, so that I can make an informed purchasing decision.
attributes_and_rules: Product pages must include images, specifications, pricing, stock status, and user reviews.
Customers should be able to add ratings and feedback.
acceptance_criteria: Given a product page, when a user views it, then detailed information such as images, specifications, and price should be displayed.
Given a review form, when a user submits a rating and feedback, then it should be visible on the product page.

steps: Given a product detail page, when a user views it, then detailed product information should be displayed.
Given a product detail page, when a user submits a review, then it should be displayed on the page.

title: Manage Shopping Cart
description: As a customer, I want to manage items in my shopping cart, so that I can update, remove, or proceed to checkout.
attributes_and_rules: Users must be able to add, edit, and remove items from the cart.
Cart contents should persist across sessions.
acceptance_criteria: Given a shopping cart, when a user adds an item, then it should appear in the cart.
Given a shopping cart, when a user updates the quantity of an item, then the cart should reflect the change.
Given a shopping cart, when a user removes an item, then it should no longer appear in the cart.

steps: Given an item detail page, when a user adds the item to the cart, then it should appear in the cart.
Given a shopping cart, when a user updates item quantity, then the cart should reflect the updated quantity.
Given a shopping cart, when a user removes an item, then it should no longer appear in the cart.

title: Perform Checkout
description: As a customer, I want to securely checkout my items, so that I can complete my purchase.
attributes_and_rules: Checkout process should include address management and delivery options.
Support multiple payment gateways and methods such as credit/debit cards, UPI, net banking, and wallet payments.
Ensure compliance with PCI DSS standards.
acceptance_criteria: Given a checkout process, when a user enters delivery and payment details, then the order should be processed securely.
Given a checkout page, when a user selects a payment method, then it should be processed correctly.

steps: Given a checkout page, when a user enters valid delivery and payment details, then the order is processed securely.
Given a checkout page, when a user selects a payment method, then it should be processed correctly.

title: Order Processing and Tracking
description: As a customer, I want to track my order status, so that I can receive updates on shipment and delivery.
attributes_and_rules: Users should receive order confirmations, shipping details, and delivery updates.
Include workflows for order cancellation, returns, and refunds.
acceptance_criteria: Given a confirmed order, when a user views it, then shipment tracking details should be available.
Given an order, when a user requests cancellation, return or refund, then the status should update accordingly.

steps: Given a user profile page, when a user views an order, then shipment tracking details are displayed.
Given a user profile page, when a user requests an order cancellation, then the order status updates accordingly.

title: Manage Inventory
description: As an administrator, I want to manage inventory levels and vendor details, so that I can ensure product availability.
attributes_and_rules: Real-time updates for stock levels and product availability.
Integration with vendor systems for automatic restock alerts.
acceptance_criteria: Given inventory levels, when a product is sold, then stock levels should update in real-time.
Given vendor integration, when new inventory is added, then automatic updates and alerts should be generated.

steps: Given inventory management tools, when a product is sold, then stock levels update in real-time.
Given vendor systems integration, when new inventory is added, then automatic updates and alerts are generated.

title: Customer Support System
description: As a customer, I want to access support and feedback mechanisms, so that I can resolve issues and provide feedback.
attributes_and_rules: Include live chat, ticketing system, and feedback collection.
Automated FAQs and chatbot support should enhance response times.
acceptance_criteria: Given a support feature, when a customer submits a query, then a support ticket should be created.
Given a feedback form, when a customer submits feedback, then it should be recorded and visible to administrators.

steps: Given a support page, when a customer submits a query, then a support ticket is created.
Given a feedback page, when a customer submits feedback, then it is recorded and visible to admins.

title: Manage Discounts and Campaigns
description: As a marketing administrator, I want to create discount codes and promotional campaigns, so that I can attract and retain customers.
attributes_and_rules: Ability to create and manage discount codes.
Personalized offers based on user behavior and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: Given a campaign management system, when an administrator creates a discount code, then it should be applicable to customer purchases.
Given user data, when personalized offers are generated, then they should be visible to targeted customers.

steps: Given a campaign management system, when an admin creates a discount code, then it should be applicable at checkout.
Given user behavior data, when personalized offers are generated, then they should be displayed to targeted users.

title: Generate Business Insights
description: As an administrator, I want to access analytics dashboards and reports, so that I can make informed business decisions.
attributes_and_rules: Track KPIs such as revenue, conversion rates, and top-selling products.
Customizable reporting tools for insights.
acceptance_criteria: Given an analytics dashboard, when an admin views it, then key performance metrics should be displayed.
Given custom reports, when an admin generates them, then insights should be provided based on selected criteria.

steps: Given an analytics dashboard, when an admin views it, then key metrics are displayed.
Given reporting tools, when an admin generates reports based on criteria, then insights are displayed.
